attributes.action: overturn the decision to stop Territorial Army training until April 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Preventing the Territorial Army (TA) from training for six months will jeopardise the entire future of the TA. 

Recruitment will cease, interest will be lost, skills will decay and TA soldiers will find other activities to fill their time. Retention has always been key to manning the TA, and a steady diet of training throughout the year has long been recognised as a vital part of retention.

In terms of the UK defence budget the expected saving will be tiny, yet the long term damage huge.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
